seo.title: Fethiye Tango Club | Argentine Tango and Social Life
seo.description: Fethiye's most established Argentine Tango community. Dance lessons with expert instructors, weekly milongas and international workshops.

footer.slogan: Strong Technique, Sincere Community. 20 years of passion.

hero.title: Beyond Dance
hero.subtitle: A Social Life
hero.description: Fethiye Tango Club is not just a dance course; it is a community where friendships are formed, culture is shared and life is celebrated at every step.

features.title: Not Just Dance,
features.subtitle: A Lifestyle
features.description: We combine the spirit of Fethiye with the passion of Argentina. Discover the privileges offered by our community.

items.title: International Workshops
items.description: Take your technique to the top with world-famous maestros.

items.title: Milonga Nights
items.description: Experience the Argentine spirit in Fethiye.

items.title: Central Location
items.description: Easy access in the heart of Fethiye.

cta.title: Ready to
cta.subtitle: Hit the Floor?
cta.description: Join Fethiye's most established dance community. Even if you have never danced before, we are with you in your first step.

program.title: CLASS SCHEDULE

schedule.title: Fethiye Milonga
schedule.description: DJ sets, treats from local producers and social dancing.

vision.label: Tradition
vision.text: Unique style filtered from Buenos Aires school, loyal to rules.

vision.label: Method
vision.text: Kinesiology-based, scientific and flexible educational approach.

vision.label: Mission
vision.text: Qualified development and social dynamism with Fethiye Tango Club.

journey.title:
SINCE 2005,
NOT JUST STEPS, A JOURNEY OF THE SOUL
journey.description: For Erkin KUNBUK, who met music and dance at a young age, tango is more than a hobby; it is a form of expression. Guiding hundreds of dancers since 2006, Kunbuk built his own style on "freedom loyal to tradition".

primeEra.title:
From Antalya to Buenos Aires:
Global Vision
primeEra.quote: "Years spent with masters in Buenos Aires, the heart of Turkish and Argentine Tango, and organizations echoing in the international arena."
text: Laying the modern foundations of Argentine Tango in Antalya as the co-founder of AÜ and Tango Siete, Erkin KUNBUK not only trained hundreds of dancers in this period but also created his unique style by working with the greatest masters of the traditional school in Buenos Aires.
By taking the stage as an Instructor and DJ in international organizations, he became a global figure bringing Argentine Tango to the masses.

timeline.title: Fethiye: Adaptation and Deepening
timeline.desc: Maturation of boutique education methodology and focusing on individual technique studies with settlement in Fethiye.

timeline.title: Cultural Heritage & Collaboration
timeline.desc: Led the development of the local community by joining the 'Fethiye Tango Culture' formation founded by Bülent Baştürk; a flag handover combining tradition with modern.

timeline.title: Fethiye Tango Club
timeline.desc: Institutionalization of 20 years of experience and the legacy of 100s of students. The new center where tango is popularized with the correct methodology.

themes.title: BODY AWARENESS
themes.lead: Low-tempo drill sets on breathing, pivot and ground contact. You cannot establish partner balance without finding your own balance. We aim to optimize axis with gravity, minimize wasted energy and rediscover biomechanics of the body specifically for tango.

themes.title: COMMUNICATION & INTENTION
themes.lead: Variations focusing on creating common composition instead of leader/follower roles. Discover the dialogue within the dance. We practice how intention turns into movement, how the partner reads this intention, and how a real connection is established instead of manipulation.

themes.title: MUSICALITY LABORATORY
themes.lead: Layer-by-layer rhythm analysis with live bandoneon recordings. Don't just hear the music, breathe inside it. We examine the conflict between melody and rhythm, phrasing, and how to incorporate the characteristic textures of Golden Age orchestras of Argentine Tango into our dance.
